original_text: And Menahem exacted the money of Israel, even of all the mighty men of wealth, of each man fifty shekels of silver, to give to the king of Assyria. So the king of Assyria turned back, and stayed not there in the land.
korean_text: 그 은을 이스라엘 모든 큰 부자에게서 강탈하여 각 사람에게 은 오십 세겔씩 내게 하여 앗수르 왕에게 주었더니 이에 앗수르 왕이 되돌아가 그 땅에 머물지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Menahem exacted the money of Israel
even of all the mighty men of wealth
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 부유한 모든 권세 있는 자들에게서도

sentences.original_text: of each man fifty shekels of silver
to give to the king of Assyria
So the king of Assyria turned back
and stayed not there in the land
